properties.entry: UPDATE MEMBER SET LOCATION_NO = ? , MEMBER_ID = ? , MEMBER_NAME = ? , MEMBER_ALIAS = ? , EMAIL = ? , GENDER = ? , AGE = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
SELECT MEMBER_NO , LOCATION_NO , MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_PWD , MEMBER_NAME , MEMBER_ALIAS , EMAIL , GENDER , AGE , ENROLL_DATE , REPORT_COUNT , STATUS , PF_STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PWD = ? AND MEMBER_NO = ?

SELECT F.MEMBER_NO AS "MEMBER_NO" , M.MEMBER_ALIAS AS "FRIEND_ALIAS" , MUSIC.MUSIC_TITLE || '-' || MUSIC.MUSIC_SINGER AS "RECENT_MUSIC" FROM FRIEND_LIST F JOIN ( SELECT R.MEMBER_NO AS "MEMBER_NO" , R.MUSIC_NO AS "MUSIC_NO" , ML.MUSIC_TITLE AS "MUSIC_TITLE" , ML.MUSIC_SINGER AS "MUSIC_SINGER" FROM RECENT_MUSIC R JOIN MUSIC_LIST ML ON(R.MUSIC_NO = ML.MUSIC_NO) ) MUSIC ON (F.FRIEND_NO = MUSIC.MEMBER_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(F.FRIEND_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE F.MEMBER_NO = ?
INSERT INTO FRIEND_LIST ( FRIEND_NO , MEMBER_NO ) VALUES ( ? , ? )
SELECT MEMBER_NO FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?
SELECT MEMBER_NO FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ALIAS = ?
